article.title: I Made Some Data Visualizations For My Girlfriend
article.author: Eric Bai
article.excerpt: I just finished my undergrad last month, and it's really sinking in how special and fleeting the past five years have been. I'm privileged to have had so many unique opportunities and experiences throughout these fourteen trimesters, both in my career and personal life.

authors.bio: A Canadian software engineer in New York. I watch a lot of movies.
authors.name: Eric Bai
